  value: true
});

var _models2 = _interopRequireDefault(_models);
 
function _interopRequireDefault(obj) { return obj && obj.__esModule ? obj : { default: obj }; }
 
/**
 * create event controller.
 *
 * @param {object} req - The request body
 * @param {object} res - The response body
 *
 * @returns {object} (data, message)
 */
var createEvent = function createEvent(req, res) {
  req.checkBody('name', 'event name is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('purpose', 'purpose is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('note', 'a short note is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('eventDate', 'event date is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('userId', 'user Id field must not be empty').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('centerId', 'center Id field must not be empty').notEmpty();
 
  var errors = [];
  var event = {
    name: req.body.name,
    purpose: req.body.purpose,
    note: req.body.note,
    eventDate: req.body.eventDate,
    userId: req.body.userId,
    centerId: req.body.centerId
  };
 
  req.getValidationResult().then(function (result) {
    if (!result.isEmpty()) {
      errors = result.array().map(function (e) {
        return e.msg;
      });
      res.status(400).json({
        message: errors
      });
    } else {
      return _models2.default.Event.findOne({
        where: {
          centerId: parseInt(req.body.centerId, 10),
          eventDate: req.body.eventDate
        }
      }).then(function (e) {
        Eif (e) {
          return res.status(409).json({
            message: 'An event has been booked for this date.'
          });
        }
        return _models2.default.Event.create(event).then(function (newEvent) {
          if (newEvent) {
            return res.status(201).json({
              message: 'Event is scheduled successfuly. Thanks',
              data: newEvent
            });
          }
        });
      });
    }
  });
};
 
/**
 * Controller to get event by Id
 *
 * @param {object} req - The request body
 * @param {object} res - The reponse body
 *
 * @returns {object} (message)
 */
var getEventsById = function getEventsById(req, res) {
  return _models2.default.Event.findById(parseInt(req.params.id, 10)).then(function (event) {
    if (event) {
      return res.status(200).json({
        data: event,
        code: 200
      });
    }
    return res.status(404).json({
      message: 'You are yet to book an event'
    });
  });
};

      return res.status(200).json({
        data: event

    return res.status(200).json({
      message: 'No event is scheduled yet'
    });
  });
};
 
/**
 * Controller to get all event
 *
 * @param {object} req - The request object
 * @param {object} res - The response object
 *
 * @returns {object} (data)
 */
 
var getEventPerPage = function getEventPerPage(req, res) {
  var limit = 5;
  var offset = 0;
  return _models2.default.Event.findAndCountAll().then(function (data) {
    var page = req.params.page;
 
    var isNum = isNaN(req.params.page); //eslint-disable-line
    page = parseInt(page, 10);
    var pages = Math.ceil(data.count / limit);
    if (page <= 0 || !Number.isInteger(page) || isNum) {
      return res.status(400).json({
        message: 'Invalid page number, should start with 1'
      });
    }
    offset = limit * (page - 1);
    return _models2.default.Event.findAll({
      limit: limit, offset: offset, order: [['id', 'ASC']]
    }).then(function (events) {
      return res.status(200).json({
        data: events,
        count: data.count,
        pages: pages
      });
    }).catch(function (err) {
      return res.status(500).send('Internal server error');
    });
  });
};
 
/**

var updateEventById = function updateEventById(req, res) {
  req.checkBody('name', 'event name is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('purpose', 'purpose is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('note', 'a short note is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('eventDate', 'event date is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('userId', 'user id is required');
  req.checkBody('centerId', 'center id is required');
  req.checkParams('id', 'event id is required').notEmpty();
 
  var errors = [];
  var event = {
    name: req.body.name,
    purpose: req.body.purpose,
    note: req.body.note,
    eventDate: req.body.eventDate,
    userId: req.body.userId,
    centerId: req.body.centerId
  };

          where: {
            centerId: parseInt(req.body.centerId, 10),
            eventDate: req.body.eventDate

            where: {

            }
          }).then(function (upEvent) {

          });
        });
      }
      return res.status(404).json({
        message: 'Event with ID ' + req.params.id + ' not found'
      });
    });
  });
};
 
/**
 * Controller to delete event by Id
 *
 * @param {object} req - The request object
 * @param {object} res - The response object
 *
 * @returns {object} (message)
 */
var deleteEventById = function deleteEventById(req, res) {
  if (isNaN(req.params.id)) {
    // eslint-disable-line
    return res.status(400).json({
      message: 'Please supply the event ID'
    });
  }
  return _models2.default.Event.destroy({
    where: {
      id: req.params.id
    }
  }).then(function (event) {
    return res.status(200).json({
      message: 'event is successfully deleted'
    });
  });
};
 
var eventControllers = {
  createEvent: createEvent,
  getAllEvents: getAllEvents,
  getEventsById: getEventsById,
  updateEventById: updateEventById,
  deleteEventById: deleteEventById,
  getEventPerPage: getEventPerPage
};
 
exports.default = eventControllers;
